mapper.select: SELECT qih.IQC_HEADER_ID, qih.MATERIAL_ID, mm.MATERIAL_CODE, mm.MATERIAL_NAME, qih.QUANTITY, qih.UOM_ID, mu.UOM_CODE, qih.SUPPLIER_ID, ms.SUPPLIER_CODE, ms.SUPPLIER_NAME, qih.CREATED_DATE, qih.LOCATOR_ID, mml.LOCATOR_CODE, mml.LOCATOR_NAME, qih.IDENTIFICATION, qih.UAI_FLAG, qih.INSPECTION_TYPE, qih.CREATED_DATE, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY,qih.CREATED_DATE,NOW()) TEST_DAY, CASE qih.INSPECTION_TYPE WHEN 'FIRST_INSPECTION' THEN mid.INSTRUCTION_DOC_NUM WHEN 'SECOND_INSPECTION' THEN ( SELECT id.INSTRUCTION_DOC_NUM FROM qms_iqc_header ih, mt_instruction_doc id WHERE ih.DOC_HEADER_ID = id.INSTRUCTION_DOC_ID AND ih.IQC_HEADER_ID = qih.DOC_HEADER_ID LIMIT 1 ) ELSE '' END INSTRUCTION_DOC_NUM FROM QMS_IQC_HEADER qih LEFT JOIN mt_instruction_doc mid ON mid.INSTRUCTION_DOC_ID = qih.DOC_HEADER_ID LEFT JOIN mt_material mm ON qih.MATERIAL_ID = mm.MATERIAL_ID LEFT JOIN mt_uom mu ON mu.UOM_ID = qih.UOM_ID LEFT JOIN mt_supplier ms ON qih.SUPPLIER_ID = ms.SUPPLIER_ID LEFT JOIN mt_mod_locator mml ON qih.LOCATOR_ID = mml.LOCATOR_ID where qih.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND qih.INSPECTION_STATUS = 'NEW' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM qms_iqc_header qh WHERE qh.INSPECTION_TYPE = 'SECOND_INSPECTION' AND qh.DOC_HEADER_ID = qih.IQC_HEADER_ID ) ORDER BY qih.CREATED_DATE ASC

SELECT date( mida.ATTR_VALUE ) ACTUAL_RECEIVE_DATE, sum( mia.ACTUAL_QTY ) ACTUAL_RECEIVE_QTY FROM mt_instruction_doc mid LEFT JOIN mt_instruction_doc_attr mida ON mid.INSTRUCTION_DOC_ID = mida.INSTRUCTION_DOC_ID AND mida.ATTR_NAME = 'ACTUAL_RECEIVED_DATE' LEFT JOIN mt_instruction mi ON mi.SOURCE_DOC_ID = mid.INSTRUCTION_DOC_ID LEFT JOIN mt_instruction_actual mia ON mia.INSTRUCTION_ID = mi.INSTRUCTION_ID WHERE mid.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND mid.INSTRUCTION_DOC_STATUS = 'RECEIVE_COMPLETE' AND mid.INSTRUCTION_DOC_TYPE = 'DELIVERY_DOC' AND mi.INSTRUCTION_TYPE = 'RECEIVE_FROM_SUPPLIER' AND DATE_SUB( CURDATE( ), INTERVAL 30 DAY ) < date( mida.ATTR_VALUE ) GROUP BY date( mida.ATTR_VALUE )

SELECT date_format(mida.ATTR_VALUE ,'%Y-%m') ACTUAL_RECEIVE_DATE, sum( mia.ACTUAL_QTY ) ACTUAL_RECEIVE_QTY FROM mt_instruction_doc mid LEFT JOIN mt_instruction_doc_attr mida ON mid.INSTRUCTION_DOC_ID = mida.INSTRUCTION_DOC_ID AND mida.ATTR_NAME = 'ACTUAL_RECEIVED_DATE' LEFT JOIN mt_instruction mi ON mid.INSTRUCTION_DOC_ID = mi.SOURCE_DOC_ID LEFT JOIN mt_instruction_actual mia ON mia.INSTRUCTION_ID = mi.INSTRUCTION_ID WHERE mid.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND mid.INSTRUCTION_DOC_STATUS = 'RECEIVE_COMPLETE' AND mid.INSTRUCTION_DOC_TYPE = 'DELIVERY_DOC' AND LAST_DAY(DATE_SUB(mida.ATTR_VALUE, INTERVAL 12 MONTH)) < mida.ATTR_VALUE GROUP BY date_format(mida.ATTR_VALUE ,'%Y-%m') ORDER BY date_format(mida.ATTR_VALUE ,'%Y-%m')

SELECT date_format( qih.INSPECTION_FINISH_DATE, '%Y-%m' ) INSPECTION_FINISH_DATE, sum( qih.INSPECTION_TIME ) INSPECTION_TIME FROM QMS_IQC_HEADER qih WHERE qih.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND qih.INSPECTION_STATUS = 'COMPLETED' AND LAST_DAY( DATE_SUB( qih.INSPECTION_FINISH_DATE, INTERVAL 12 MONTH ) ) < qih.INSPECTION_FINISH_DATE GROUP BY date_format( qih.INSPECTION_FINISH_DATE, '%Y-%m' ) ORDER BY date_format( qih.INSPECTION_FINISH_DATE, '%Y-%m' )
